dashboard.cta_strava_welcome_text: Welcome! Integrate an account to start earning tokens for your activities.
dashboard.cta_strava_start_earning: At the moment, we only support STRAVA integration.
dashboard.stats_tooltip_earned_text: The total number of $FIT token earned from your  fitness activities imported from Strava
dashboard.stats_get_more: 30 more to get 5% boost and earn a digital medal
dashboard.stats_tooltip_referral_text: Invite 50 fitness buddies to join Elevate and get 5% boost for your earning, plus a really cool “Super friend” medal, and unblock next reward level
dashboard.referral_text: The best way to get in shape is to do it with friends! Invite your friends to join you at Elevate and keep each other accountable.
